150472.story: Two women lean in with open mouths toward a large slice of pizza on a paper plate, each taking a bite from it.

2344622.story: A person is typing on a keyboard. A cat is resting its head next to the person's arm, near the keyboard.

2345035.story: A girl in a blue jersey runs towards a football while a girl in a white jersey runs alongside and challenges her for it.

2347025.story: A woman carries a baby on her back. The baby holds up a pink umbrella above them.

2347400.story: Two men sit on a couch, each holding a wine glass near their faces and smelling the wine.

2348899.story: A woman touches the seated man's striped tie while he smiles. A man in a suit leans in and gestures toward the seated man during their conversation.

2349475.story: A man uses a bike to power a blender while a woman holds the lid of the blender filled with liquid.

2350974.story: A child drinks from a bottle while standing next to a red car. The child rests a hand on the car door.

2356125.story: Two uniformed women push large bags along an airport conveyor belt, while two other uniformed staff stand nearby.

2360001.story: Two workers are positioning a large round sign on a building facade, with one of them steadying it while the other attaches it to the bracket.

2362277.story: A player in white runs while attempting to throw a frisbee. A player in red closely blocks him from throwing the frisbee.

2362704.story: Two bears are eating pieces of a pumpkin on the ground. One bear has its face in the hollow pumpkin while the other eats a chunk nearby.

2363971.story: A woman pets a large dog in the foreground while another woman in a chair holds a child upside down on her lap.

2366915.story: Two surfers ride along the same breaking wave as water sprays behind and around them.

2367132.story: Two men are playing a video game while holding motion controllers and moving their arms.

2369373.story: A chef opens the wood-fired oven and holds the oven door while looking into the flames.

2370664.story: Two men and a woman are taking bites of donuts. They are close together outdoors, holding the donuts up to their mouths.

2371471.story: Two motorcyclists are airborne on dirt bikes inside a building, performing jumps above a ramp.

2374670.story: A red truck sprays water onto a dirt track through nozzles at the back. A man is climbing on the back of the truck while it operates.

2379478.story: A baby and a toddler are lying on a bed, each drinking from a bottle.

2383555.story: A woman sits in a small boat holding a child on her lap while rowing with a paddle. A man behind her also rows the boat through the water.

2385550.story: A boy and a girl each have a tangerine in their mouth and are eating it while facing the camera.

2386442.story: A woman, a child, and a man are each brushing their teeth with toothbrushes. They are facing the camera while brushing.

2387122.story: A polar bear presses against the glass while a person on the other side takes a photo of it.

2390192.story: A teen boy hugs a girl while talking on a phone. The teen girl holds another phone in her hand.

2397102.story: A woman and a man are cutting a decorated wedding cake together while the man holds a bottle in his other hand.

2401636.story: A cat leans toward and sniffs a baby sitting beside it. A woman holds the cat close while watching them.

2411268.story: A child reaches up to pick an apple from a tree while holding a bag for collecting fruit.

2412687.story: A person holds out a red frisbee toward a dog. The dog reaches its mouth toward the frisbee.

2356991.story: One player is sliding headfirst toward the base. A fielder stands by the base and catches the incoming ball.

2385851.story: Two people walk along a covered walkway while each carries a large red suitcase.

2394020.story: Two riders are riding horses along the sandy shore beside the water.

2406346.story: One elephant reaches its trunk toward the tail/back area of another elephant walking ahead. A handler walks beside the elephants holding a stick and leading the elephants forward.

2408717.story: Several surfers walk along the shoreline while carrying their surfboards. Waves roll in front of them as they head down towards the beach.

2409918.story: Two men are riding elephants while they are standing in moderately deep water. One elephant is eating plants with its trunk.

2410309.story: A woman sits on a couch using a laptop on her lap. A baby beside her touches and uses another open laptop.
